add.page: Gérer les flottes Assigner un Commandant Choisissez un ou plusieurs adjoints(label used for help text during selection) Choisir un Commandant(label used for help text during selection) Ordre reçu Adjoint(label used in order confirmation) Commandant(label used in order confirmation) Impossible d'assigner à l'adjoint(label used to prevent cyclic dependencies) Officier de Défense requis(label used for capital ships that don't have defence officers) Menu indisponible au quai(used to indicate fleet management cannot be done while docked yet) Transmettre le comportement(menu item label) Suivre(peaceful follow order) Défensif(passive escort order) Défensif \(En formation\)(label used to indicate that captains should not break formation when detecting enemies) Offensif(aggressive escort order) Offensif \(En formation\)(label used to indicate that captains should not break formation when detecting enemies) Choisir le Commandant qui transmettra le comportement(help text for order broadcasting) Reçu: %1> Définir le comportement(menu item label) Rapport de flotte(menu item label to show all stances for all NPCs in the player's fleet) Comportements actifs(notification caption) %1 requis(label used to indicate that a certain NPC type is needed) Choisissez la distance maximum d'engagement(help text for engagement distance selection) Aucune flotte détectée(notification text for fleet report if no fleets exist) Rapport de Flotte en temps réel(notification caption for fleet status reports) commande %1 vaisseau\(x\)(text for fleet status reports) %1 vaisseau\(x\) de ligne(text for fleet status reports) %1 chasseur\(s\)(text for fleet status reports) a détecté %1 enemi\(s\)(text for fleet status reports) dans la zone %1(text for fleet status reports) Engage les vaisseaux ennemis(text for fleet status reports) Commandes de Flotte(menu item label for fleet commands section) Envahir une zone(menu item label for fleet command to attack a zone) Choisissez le commandant qui exécutera la commande(help text for fleet commands) exécute la commande(text for 'attack zone' ack notification) Remove from Commander(menu item label for removing a ship from a fleet) Not supported yet(label used in case player is trying to assign fighter to capital ship) Successfully uninstalled UFO V%1.\nPlease save the game, close Rebirth, delete the UFO folder from your extensions folder, then load and save your game. Please note that the currently installed UFO version is an experimental release. If you experience any bugs, please report them on the Egosoft forums or on the Nexus. Installing UFO V%1... Detected UFO update: V%1 -> V%2\nPlease save the game \(in a new slot\) and load it again. Updated UFO configuration found....Update successful!
